text:
@GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump COVID-19 is still very much an issue, over 100,000 Americans are dead from it, police are murdering and brutalizing citizens, the president and White House are posting doctored propaganda videos to LIE to their base... and THIS is what you're worried about?

You NEED a bong hit.
